TextView.android:text: Quinnery was designed by Zahid Hasan and Jeanne Allen for Hack@Brown 2019. It is inspired by real life zoologist and ecology student Quinn Santos and intended as an educational tool for anyone looking to help maintain American ecosystems. Be warned that plants are dangerous (many are armed with thorns, teeth, or literal arms) and should be approached with extreme caution. Have you ever seen a vine strangle someone? I have. It happens. Trust me. You don't wanna be that guy. All rights reserved.
